description.value:
Decadent: You were born into the upper echelons of nobility and want for nothing. The decadent lifestyle you lead would be the envy of most, and scandal follows you like a faithful hound.

You are envied by many and reviled by the rest, but you dismiss their opinions as nothing more than the petty sniping of the bitter and envious.

system.benefit: Gain +3 Willpower. Gain the Decadence Talent and a +5 bonus to Charm Tests. However, gain 1d5 Corruption Points from your life of excess.

prerequisites.text: A Product of Upbringing Origin (150 XP)

system.notes: Costs 150 XP from starting experience. Gain 1d5 Corruption Points.

specialAbilities.name: Life of Excess
specialAbilities.description: Gain 1d5 Corruption Points from your decadent lifestyle.
